author: adityapatwardhan
body:
We do not publish any help content for FAQ, General and Glossary help providers. These were only used in v1 of Powershell.

<!--

If you are a PowerShell Team member, please make sure you choose the Reviewer(s) and Assignee for your PR.
If you are not from the PowerShell Team, you can leave the fields blank and the Maintainers will choose them for you. If you are familiar with the team, feel free to mention some Reviewers yourself.

For more information about the roles of Reviewer and Assignee, refer to CONTRIBUTING.md.

-->

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan Please find appropriate reviewers for your PR.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @joeyaiello do you have any concerns if we remove support for these help providers?

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: I think you meant to add Francisco as a reviewer.

comments.author: Francisco-Gamino
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan : We need to update the update-help schema validation to no longer reference the schemas you are removing. Also, we might need to update the documentation for provider help. Could you please open issues for these? Lastly, we should create a issue to add provider help to the CI test pass (in case you don't have any scenarios yet). Thanks.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @Francisco-Gamino I have removed the references to the XSDs that have been removed by this PR.

title: Removed unused help providers and related classes.
